H0.text: Which country has as its national coat of arms a shield bearing a vicuna, a cinchona tree and a cornucopia spilling mineral wealth in the shape of coins. Chile

H1.text: Which country has as its national coat of arms a shield bearing a vicuna, a cinchona tree and a cornucopia spilling mineral wealth in the shape of coins. Colombia

H2.text: Which country has as its national coat of arms a shield bearing a vicuna, a cinchona tree and a cornucopia spilling mineral wealth in the shape of coins. Ecuador

H3.text: Which country has as its national coat of arms a shield bearing a vicuna, a cinchona tree and a cornucopia spilling mineral wealth in the shape of coins. Peru

A4.text: The arms of the Peruvian Nation shall consist of a shield divided into three fields: one celestial blue to the left, with a vicuna looking inside; other white to the right, with a Cinchona officinalis placed within, and another, red, in the bottom and smaller, with a cornucopia pouring coins
